TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PolicyLevel extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 Common Language Runtime 的安全性原則層級。

span.span: Represents the security policy levels for the common language runtime.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，common language runtime (CLR) 會從電腦提供安全性原則。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the common language runtime (CLR) is moving away from providing security policy for computers. 我們建議您改用[Windows 軟體限制原則 (SRP)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178101)或[AppLocker](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178102) CLR 安全性原則來取代。We recommend that you use [Windows Software Restriction Policies (SRP)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178101) or [AppLocker](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178102) as a replacement for CLR security policy. 本主題資訊適用於.NET Framework 3.5 及更早版本。不適用於[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]和更新版本。The information in this topic applies to the .NET Framework version 3.5 and earlier; it does not apply to the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] and later. 如需有關這個主題以及其他變更的詳細資訊，請參閱[安全性變更](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For more information about this and other changes, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md). 最高等級的安全性原則是整個企業。The highest level of security policy is enterprise-wide. 連續的較低層級的階層表示進一步原則限制，但可以永遠不會授與超過允許的更高層級的權限。Successive lower levels of hierarchy represent further policy restrictions, but can never grant more permissions than allowed by higher levels. 會實作下列原則層級：The following policy levels are implemented: 1. Enterprise： 在企業中的所有 managed 程式碼的安全性原則。Enterprise: Security policy for all managed code in an enterprise. 2. 在電腦上執行的所有 managed 程式碼的電腦： 安全性原則。Machine: Security policy for all managed code run on the computer. 3. 在使用者執行的所有 managed 程式碼的使用者： 安全性原則。User: Security policy for all managed code run by the user. 4. 應用程式定義域： 應用程式中的所有 managed 程式碼的安全性原則。Application domain: Security policy for all managed code in an application. 原則層級所組成的一組組織成單一的根樹狀結構的程式碼群組 (請參閱)、 一組具名使用權限集合所指定權限授與程式碼群組，程式碼的程式碼群組參考和清單完全信任組件。A policy level consists of a set of code groups organized into a single rooted tree (see ), a set of named permission sets that are referenced by the code groups to specify permissions to be granted to code belonging to the code group, and a list of fully-trusted assemblies. 使用列舉原則層級。Use to enumerate the policy levels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會授與的完全信任的組件的安全性原則評估期間不在清單中，但不是會自動授與完全信任時直接安全性系統所評估原則。 are granted full trust during security policy evaluation of assemblies not in the list, but are not automatically granted full trust when directly evaluated by the security policy system. 因為這些版本中並未使用完全信任組件清單，在 2.0 版或更新版本的.NET Framework 中不支援屬性。The property is not supported in version 2.0 or later of the .NET Framework because the list of full trust assemblies is not used in those versions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Recover() cil managed

summary.span: 以最近的備份 (反映上次儲存之前的原則狀態) 取代這個 的組態檔，而將它還原成最近的狀態。

span.span: Replaces the configuration file for this with the last backup (reflecting the state of policy prior to the last time it was saved) and returns it to the state of the last save.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會修改目前。This method does not make modifications to the current . 相反地，它會更新物件的檔案和安全性系統會使用來評估原則。Instead, it updates the object's file and the that the security system uses to evaluate policy. 這個方法由 caspol-復原選項 (請參閱[Caspol.exe （程式碼存取安全性原則工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md))。This method is used by the caspol -recover option (see [Caspol.exe (Code Access Security Policy Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/caspol-exe-code-access-security-policy-tool.md)).

exception.span: 原則層級不具有有效的組態檔。

span.span: The policy level does not have a valid configuration file.

summary.span: 從原則層級用來評估原則的組件清單中移除組件。

span.span: Removes an assembly from the list of assemblies the policy level uses to evaluate policy.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The used to resolve the .

summary.span: 依據原則層級的辨識項 (Evidence) 來解析原則，並傳回結果 。

span.span: Resolves policy based on evidence for the policy level, and returns the resulting .
The resulting .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是原則層級的基本原則評估作業。 is the basic policy evaluation operation for policy levels. 這個方法會提供一組的辨識項做為輸入，測試從根目錄開始且正常往下比對的程式碼群組的成員資格條件。Given a set of evidence as input, this method tests membership conditions of code groups starting at the root and working down as matched. 比對的程式碼所產生的權限的組合群組產生傳回。The combination of permissions resulting from the matching code groups produces a that is returned. 在授與權限的程式碼，安全性原則會使用所有適用的原則層級，以及程式碼要求權限解析過的原則陳述式。In granting permissions to code, security policy uses the resolved policy statements for all applicable policy levels, together with the code request for permissions. ## Examples 下列程式碼將示範如何使用方法。The following code shows the use of the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/CPP/policylevel.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/CS/policylevel.cs#13)] [!code-vb[system.Security.policy.policylevel#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.policy.policylevel/VB/policylevel.vb#13)]

exception.span: 原則層級包含多個標記為獨佔的相符程式碼群組。

span.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.
The parameter is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The used to resolve policy.

summary.span: 在原則層級上解析原則並傳回符合辨識項的程式碼群組樹狀結構其根目錄。

span.span: Resolves policy at the policy level and returns the root of a code group tree that matches the evidence.

returns.span: ，表示符合指定辨識項的程式碼群組樹狀結構的根目錄。

span.span: A representing the root of a tree of code groups matching the specified evidence.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來分析程式碼中的群組原則層級一組特定的辨識項的影響。You can use this method to analyze the effect of the code groups in a policy level with respect to a certain set of evidence. 例如，如果安全性原則未授與組件需要的最小的程式碼要求權限，可能很難由檢查完全問題所在的程式碼群組。For example, if the security policy is not granting an assembly the minimum code request permissions it needs, it can be difficult to tell by examination of the code groups exactly where the problem is. 這個方法會傳回程式碼群組可以有子程式碼群組，所以很可能讓系統管理員檢查程式碼群組和它的子程式碼群組，並判斷哪些程式碼群組的比對。Since this method returns a code group that can have child code groups, it is possible for an administrator to examine the code group and its child code groups and determine which code groups match.

exception.span: 原則層級包含多個標記為獨佔的相符程式碼群組。

span.span: The policy level contains multiple matching code groups marked as exclusive.
The parameter is .

value.span: ，是原則層級程式碼群組的樹狀結構的根。

span.span: The that is the root of the tree of policy level code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個原則層級都有一個根。Every policy level has one root .

span.span: The value for is .

span.span: Gets the type of the policy level.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最高等級的安全性原則是整個企業。The highest level of security policy is enterprise-wide. 連續的較低層級的階層表示進一步原則限制，但可以永遠不會授與超過允許的更高層級的權限。Successive lower levels of hierarchy represent further policy restrictions, but can never grant more permissions than allowed by higher levels. 原則中的層級順序如下所示。The policy levels in order are the following. 1. 企業Enterprise 2. 機器Machine 3. 使用者User 4. 應用程式定義域Application domain 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .
